mapper.insert:
insert into t_tyc_company ( company_id, reg_number, reg_status, credit_code, reg_capital, company_type, name, id, org_number, type, base, city, district, legal_person_name, staff_num_range, from_time, to_time, bond_name, bond_num, is_micro_ent, used_bond_name, percentile_score, reg_institute, reg_location, industry, approved_time, social_staff_num, tags, tax_number, business_scope, property3, alias, estiblish_time, update_times, bond_type, actual_capital, company_org_type, reg_capital_currency, actual_capital_currency, revoke_date, revoke_reason, cancel_date, cancel_reason, history_names
) values ( #{companyId}, #{regNumber}, #{regStatus}, #{creditCode}, #{regCapital}, #{companyType}, #{name}, #{id}, #{orgNumber}, #{type}, #{base}, #{city}, #{district}, #{legalPersonName}, #{staffNumRange}, #{fromTime}, #{toTime}, #{bondName}, #{bondNum}, #{isMicroEnt}, #{usedBondName}, #{percentileScore}, #{regInstitute}, #{regLocation}, #{industry}, #{approvedTime}, #{socialStaffNum}, #{tags}, #{taxNumber}, #{businessScope}, #{property3}, #{alias}, #{estiblishTime}, #{updateTimes}, #{bondType}, #{actualCapital}, #{companyOrgType}, #{regCapitalCurrency}, #{actualCapitalCurrency}, #{revokeDate}, #{revokeReason}, #{cancelDate}, #{cancelReason}, #{historyNames} )
